title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Basic ideas of complexity, Scaling, Self-Similarity and measures of complexity; Complexities in classical systems (e.g. fluctuations in various chaotic and random systems, nonlinear waves, cellular automata, bio-systems); Complexities in quantum systems (disordered systems, scattering systems).
